nodes.text: Soras Varn was the individual responsible for writing Bounty Hunter Means and Methods: Comparative Psychological Perspectives and Quantifications. It was first published in the proceedings of the Institute of Imperial Psychological Studies.

Soras Varn was first mentioned Galaxy Guide 10: Bounty Hunters and was later referenced in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
